alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Franklin; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 12:16AM CST until December 14 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northeastern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1216 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wallace Ridge, or 15 miles northwest of Ferriday, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lee Bayou around 1235 AM CST. Cooter Point around 1250 AM CST. Helena around 1255 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gilbert and Sicily Island. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
